Name: Pirates on Deck VR
About the game: Get on board and sail the seven seas. Enemy pirates and dangerous monsters are all over your ship! Donâ€™t let anyone stand in your way. Pirates on Deck VR is an arcade wave shooter for all ages, featuring local leaderboards and progressive difficulty.
